title: Foliage Folio
content: A web application that allows users to manage a database of their plants and track when they water them.

title: Canada's Drag Data-Race
content: A database tracking the placement of Canada's Drag Race contestants, displayed with PHP.

title: Portfolio Backend
content: A Client Management System that allows a user to log in, manipulate content, and generate corresponding JSON files.

title: Capstone Project
content: An interactive non-fiction narrative intimately exploring my personal relationship with the internet.
